summary: "Fargo" season 2, which aired in 2015, is a crime drama set in the Upper Midwest in 1979. It follows a young couple, Peggy and Ed, trying to cover up a hit-and-run involving a crime family's son. State trooper Lou and sheriff Hank investigate the linked homicides. The season, with a star-studded cast, received critical acclaim and won many awards. Each "Fargo" season tells a separate story, connected through a shared universe. This season was a prequel to the first, expanding the show's storytelling and world.
title: Fargo season 2
